properties.name: Detect
properties.help: Automatically detect organization.

properties.name: Id
properties.help: The ID of an existing query.  Required unless --path or --wiql are specified.

properties.name: Org
properties.help: Azure DevOps organization URL. You can configure the default organization using az devops configure -d organization=ORG_URL. Required if not configured as default or picked up via git config. Example: https://dev.azure.com/MyOrganizationName/.

properties.name: Path
properties.help: The path of an existing query.  Ignored if --id is specified.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: Name or ID of the project. You can configure the default project using az devops configure -d project=NAME_OR_ID. Required if not configured as default or picked up via git config.

properties.name: Wiql
properties.help: The query in Work Item Query Language format.  Ignored if --id or --path is specified.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Title
properties.help: Title of the work item.

properties.name: Type
properties.help: Name of the work item type (e.g. Bug).

properties.name: Area
properties.help: Area the work item is assigned to (e.g. Demos).

properties.name: AssignedTo
properties.help: Name of the person the work item is assigned-to (e.g. fabrikam).

properties.name: Description
properties.help: Description of the work item.

properties.name: Detect
properties.help: Automatically detect organization.

properties.name: Discussion
properties.help: Comment to add to a discussion in a work item.

properties.name: Fields
properties.help: Space separated "field=value" pairs for custom fields you would like to set.

properties.name: Iteration
properties.help: Iteration path of the work item (e.g. DemosIteration 1).

properties.name: Open
properties.help: Open the work item in the default web browser.

properties.name: Org
properties.help: Azure DevOps organization URL. You can configure the default organization using az devops configure -d organization=ORG_URL. Required if not configured as default or picked up via git config. Example: https://dev.azure.com/MyOrganizationName/.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: Name or ID of the project. You can configure the default project using az devops configure -d project=NAME_OR_ID. Required if not configured as default or picked up via git config.

properties.name: Reason
properties.help: Reason for the state of the work item.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Id
properties.help: Unique id of the work item.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.help: Permanently delete this work item.

properties.help: Name or ID of the project. You can configure the default project using az devops configure -d project=NAME_OR_ID. Required if not configured as default or picked up via git config.

commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.
